title: Alpha Client won't open after I have closed it
body: I got accepted into the Alpha client a little bit ago. After it downloaded, I check marked the run alpha client after it finished. I played a game on it and it went fine. After the game I closed it because I was done playing for a bit. Now when I try to run it, nothing happens. I double click it to open it and it doesn't open. I tried it once regularly and then i tried it when it was on "Run as Administrator" and neither of them was successful. Anyways, I hope someone can help. Thanks :)

replies.body: I might be a little bit late but opening task manager, ending the League alpha client process, and then reopening the program should help that problem. I am getting the same issue too.
I've tried that and it hasn't solved the issue :/
You go to task manager and hit more details, then look for the process called lol client or league client. That worked for me.

I Tried That As Well It Shows in Task manager its trying to open but just sticks on a certain amount its using then when i open it again without ending it, it just sits at a dark blue screen with nothing on it i tried updating but nothing lol.

If you see this problem again, open a Command Prompt and check if this command returns any results:

  tasklist | find "League"

Try killing those processes like this:

  taskkill /F /IM LeagueClientUX.exe
  taskkill /F /IM LeagueClient.exe
it does returns results....but still aplha client wont open...i am trying to kill them but access is denied
it does returns results....but still aplha client wont open
I Did Everything You Said Correctly And When I Tried To Open It Still Stuck Sadly. :/ {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
i have the same problem with the task manager and blue screen of client e.tc....can't seem to fix it somehow!!!!!
